metadata.title: CVE-2019-10145 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: rkt through version 1.30.0 does not isolate processes in containers thatare run with `rkt enter`. Processes run with `rkt enter` do not haveseccomp filtering during stage 2 (the actual environment in which theapplications run). Compromised containers could exploit this flaw to accesshost resources.

criterions.comment: rkt package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
